thread.section_title: Prestige Flowers Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.prestigeflowers.co.uk | 70 of 1012
thread.title: Mark Harvie
thread.title_full: Prestige Flowers reviewed by Mark Harvie

author: Mark Harvie
title: Mark Harvie
text:
Quite simply, the best florist I've ever used (online and face-to-face experience). The staff are amazingly friendly and helpful, happy to offer suggestions, and the website is extremely easy to navigate and find exactly what you are looking for quickly.
The added 'cherry on top' is the photos of the actual flowers the team e-mails to you. A lovely, personal touch that makes the buying experience even better.
